channel.title: Changed maximum level, skillcapes question
channel.description:
hey, real quick. i changed my maximum level from 99 to 135 on my server which is a reapagescape source. butttt now it gives a skillcape for every level after 99, and i need to know how to stop that. also, i need to know how to make it so you have to be level 135 in that skill to wear it. thanx!
=-llambo-=

item.title: Changed maximum level, skillcapes question
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

search

public void levelup(int skill) {

under that you should see

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now " + playerLevel[0] + " .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(14073, 1); addItem(14074, 1); addItem(14075, 1); sendMessage( "Congratulations, you just recived Attack skill capes and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[0] + " attack!"); } break;

that is attack skillcape there change ware it says

if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { to

if (playerLevel[0] >= 135) {

and do that to all the other skillcapes…thats to get rid of the mutable sillcapes
now for the skilcape requerments
for attack cape search

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

that’s the attack requirements void after that search 14073 (thats skill cape id) and it should say

if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; }
change the return to 135 like this

if (ItemID == 14073) { return 135; }
that will set the attack requirements for that item to 135
and do the same with other requerment voides like
defence is

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

look close at getCLDefence change Defence to the the name of the skill you want
and you get your void…hope that helped =D

Read full topic
